blocks.heading: Want to turn your phone system into a 24/7 AI assistant?

blocks.heading: Trusted in Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, and Newcastle by

cards.heading: Automate Calls Without Losing the Human Touch
cards.description: We design AI phone systems that handle routine conversations naturally, while seamlessly handing off to your team when it matters most.

cards.heading: Reduce Call Load and Operational Costs
cards.description: Our AI voice solutions answer, route, and resolve calls automatically - cutting wait times and freeing your team for higher-value work.

cards.heading: Integrate Voice AI Into Your Existing Systems
cards.description: Connect your AI phone system with CRMs, booking systems, and internal tools so every call becomes structured, actionable data

accordionItems.label: What is an AI-powered phone system?
accordionItems.content: An AI-powered phone system uses speech recognition and natural language understanding to answer calls, understand intent, respond conversationally, and route or escalate calls when needed.

accordionItems.label: What types of calls can the AI handle?
accordionItems.content: The AI can handle common enquiries such as FAQs, appointment bookings, order or case lookups, lead qualification, call routing, and after-hours support - while escalating complex calls to a human.

accordionItems.label: Can the AI transfer calls to a real person?
accordionItems.content: Yes. Calls can be transferred at any point based on intent, confidence level, keywords, or customer request, ensuring a smooth handover without repeating information.

accordionItems.label: Does this replace our existing phone system?
accordionItems.content:
No. We integrate with your existing telephony provider and systems, extending what you already have rather than forcing a full replacement.

That being said, we often reduce costs, depending on the complexity of your system.

accordionItems.label: How accurate is the voice recognition?
accordionItems.content: Accuracy is high and improves over time. We train the system using your terminology, common phrases, and call data, and continuously refine it after launch.

accordionItems.label: What happens in the free initial meeting?
accordionItems.content: In this meeting, you'll talk with one of our experienced Solution Architects and your Account Manager. You can discuss your project idea, business challenges, and goals. We'll listen, ask questions, offer initial thoughts on potential approaches or technologies, and determine if SSW is the right fit to help you achieve your objectives. There's no obligation.
